body: Polynomial and piecewise polynomial approximation, matrix least squares problems, numerical solution of eigenvalue problems, numerical solution of ordinary differential equations.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Enforced Prerequisite: MATH 455)(Additional Attributes: Cross-listed with: MATH 456)

title: CMPSC 456: Introduction to Numerical Analysis II
